author: Myaamori
name: Merge Scripts
description: Provides advanced script merging, mainly for use during QC.

0.0.2: Add menu option for generating a synchronization line
Use video position for synchronization line and shifted import definition start time
0.0.3: Make sure extradata from automations is preserved on export
0.0.4: Fix some lines not being parsed correcty due to buggy split function
0.0.5: Automatically set script properties from imported files
Abort cleanly if a file could not be read
0.0.6: Fix an issue where import paths generated on Windows weren't *nix compatible
0.0.7: Split the parsing functions of Merge Scripts into separate ASSParser module
Generate release candidate now saves to a separate file rather than editing in-place
0.0.8: Add GUI for easier selective importing and unimporting
Fix error when importing files while other files have already been imported
0.0.9: Fix compatibility issue with older MoonScript
0.0.10: Don't warn about identical styles in different files
0.0.11: Add feature for incrementing the layer of imported lines
0.0.12: When writing ASS files, generate and output one line at a time to avoid memory issues
0.0.13: Add wildcard support for import definitions
Add support for selectively exporting changes to only specified files
Make it possible to export changes even if the target file does not exist
When exporting, resolve the paths of target files using the current location of the template rather than the location when the files were originally imported
